response.overview: Mrs Ellen Edwards, who lives in the country near Wokingham in Cumberland, has a busy day as the local postwoman. She is also a busy housewife and mother and has to do the daily chores without the aid of electric or gas appliances. At the end of her day she enjoys nothing better than relaxing with her family and a mug of Bournvita. Part of an exceptional series of cinema commercials featuring working women and a campaign that used real names and addresses too!
response.title: Post Haste!
